name: Automation Centre
tag_list: business-software, collaboration-and-workflow, project-management, timesheets, help-desk, service-desk, expense-tracking, time-and-billing
overview: Founded In 1994 Automation Centre, began providing computer products and services to consulting organizations, with a special focus on technology companies. They recognized that an environment of rapidly changing market conditions and scarce skilled human resources mandated streamlined business processes. We helped our clients accomplish this by re-engineering and automating service chain processes within their businesses. In the course of their work, they created software application frameworks that produce highly responsive management and workflow environments, which automate the sales delivery and measurement processes of the service organization. These business software solutions are marketed under the trademarks Tracker Suite http://www.TrackerSuite.com and TrackerOffice http://www.trackeroffice.com and are based on Lotus Notes / Domino and Microsoft / Exchange platforms, respectively. Recently http://www.TrackerSuite.Net was released and is a 100% Web based business solution system and is capable of integrating with leading email platforms, including both Lotus Notes and Microsoft Outlook, as well as Web based email services such as Gmail.
